lom:description.lom:string: "The UM CEE program provides a solid foundation for future careers in civil and environmental engineering. Program areas are: Explore the different UM CEE research areas. (1) Structural and materials (2) Construction engineering and management (3) Geotechnical (4) Environmental and water resources .
